trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Despite your best efforts, you fail to locate a confluence of aether or any pieces of magicite...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_005<tab>Well, well, if it isn't the hero of the Resistance. I suppose I shouldn't be surprised that you are capable of holding your own this far from Port Surgate.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_006<tab>I came to this dreadful place to investigate a disturbance in the aetherial currents. Perchance you would be so kind as to tell me your reason for being here as well?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_007<tab>So this magicite you seek was the cause of these confluences, was it? I see... Glad to hear that Krile is still capable of conducting the most rudimentary research. I thank you for sharing with me your findings.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_008<tab>I shall share with you mine own discovery by way of gratitude. I believe this is the stone you were looking for?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_009<tab>Keep it. I have no use for such baubles. Consider it payment for your information, if you prefer.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_010<tab>This island was ever filled with danger and death. Despite its once-close proximity to the motherland, no one bothered to settle it for that very reason.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_011<tab>Circumventing these hazards was one of the reasons the Students devoted so many resources to the construction of an expansive Aethernet...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_012<tab>...Restoring it is an admirable endeavor, and I wish you and Krile the best of luck in it. You may tell her I said as much.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_013<tab>However, I still intend to find my own way to return to our headquarters. Go well, adventurer. I shall find you again if I have information to share.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>On closer inspection, the stone you received from Ejika does indeed appear to be another piece of magicite...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE4_00470_SYSTEM_100_014<tab>The magicite you have obtained may be used in conjunction with your magia board.
